body.name: Yangbaga Long Handled Dust Pan and Broom Set for Home,Heavy Duty Metal Dustpans and Brooms,Upright Stand Up Design,54"Outdoor Broom and 38" Dustpan Combo for,Lobby Floor, Yard,Home Kitchen Office Use
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 20 mins
features: 【This Set Includes Both The Broom and Dustpan】: Dustpans with handle is 39" in height, Long handled design that means don't need to bend down anymore. broom with extender feature is 54" in height，extender is 13" in height，Height can be adjusted to satisfy the whole family.

【Light weight & Premium】 :The standing dust pan and broom Made of premium quality stainless steel, rust proof, lightweight but sturdy, it offers unmatched durability that easily surpasses that of plastic dust pans. After testing, it can bear the weight up to 26 lbs.

【Effective Design】：The installation method of the dustpan is more convenient and quicker than the screw-in type, and there is no need to worry about easy loosening.45°Large angled head makes sweeping hard-to-reach corners, baseboards, and under furniture quick and efficient,The ergonomic design makes it easy and labor-saving.Happy Cleaning ！
【Easy Storage】 ：Dustpan clips onto broom handle for convenient and compact storage when you're done cleaning，In addition, you can also hang it up, save your space and easy for moving.

【Indoor or Outdoor Use】：Great broom and dustpan set for home, Can be used on a variety of surfaces in your home including wood, tile, and laminate floors，kitchen,garage， rv, lobby, camping, indoor and outdoor use and cleans well.
body.description: With Extension Pole Long handled design that means don't need to bend down anymore. Height can be adjusted and you can easily clean the corners of the ceilin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With Extension Pole Long handled design that means don't need to bend down anymore. Height can be adjusted and you can easily clean the corners of the ceilin. Product Dimensions Broom height:48.03inches Extender height:13inches Broom width:13.4inches Height of dustpan:38inches Dustpan width:10inches Dustpan and broom weight:1850

Heavy Duty Upright Dustpans Stand up dustpans are ideal for indoor outdoor use. With 3 poles, total height is 35 inch, no bending while doing housework. The heavy duty dustpan can bear the weight up to 26 lbs.

3 Layer Angle Broom Bristles The bristles Garage broom with 3 Layer stiff bristles has enough force to sweeping heavy things with forward speed or efficiency The bristles have frayed ends Soft and firm bristles have frayed ends to efficiently pick up all types of debris. Sweep pet hair, dust, and dirt with ease. Made of recycled PET The bristles are made of recycled PET, which can be easily recycled. It is an ideal material that meets the requirements of environmental protection.

Fits the Floor Seamlessly The mouth of the dust pan adopts the integrated stainless steel that fits the floor seamlessly. Great for debris to be swept into the dustpan, for maximum dust and dirt collection. Ergonomic Design The brooms for sweeping and cleaning angled bristles let you easily sweep under cabinets and reach into corners,it easy and labor-saving ,Compact design with flared bristles for hard to reach places Adults and children Comes with 4 extensions ,yangbaga push broom can adjust height for both adult and children ,Let your child also clean up together and cultivate his hands-on ability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice color. Works for my needs in our home. I would recommend adding adhesive tabs under the dust pan if you have wood floors or any other delicate flooring. Sturdy and easy to store most anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: simple and useful for our needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars meh/ but good customer service
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived on time which was great but part of the dust pan broke while installing it. The broom works fine.Edit: The seller did contact me quickly and provided multiple solutions for resolving the issue with my order. Great customer service and quick responses from the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Both are very eady to assemble. The broom has a very tall long handle and is very good. The dust pan is amazing. It is very strong and will last a long time. It is light and fits the floor great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sturdy at all
reviews.reviewText: The pole is sturdy, but the dustpan itself is made from a very cheap sheet metal. The dustpan bends when in use, and it is doubtful that it will last. Will follow up after a year or so on what remains of the dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great! Been using for a year and a half
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase, and has been really helpful with lots of cleaning around the house. This set is simple, cheap and effective. Really love the neutral colors too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only had plastic dust pans for years so decided to get a metal one this time. It’s so sturdy! I am really enjoying this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dust pan is very flimsy. So flimsy it's hard to get the dirt or debris into it. I have to hold it with my foot.

Very sturdy dustpan. Got it for my elder father-in-law so he didn’t have to bend down as much when sweeping his wood workshop. He said the broom is way better than any broom he has ever gotten before and the dustpan is very sturdy We are very satisfied.
